Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.util

Class EdgeRoll

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.util.EdgeRoll
public class EdgeRoll extends Object
Record co-occurrences between a fixed set of words (as int values) along texts (sequence of ints) inside a limited distance. The data structure is optimized to reduce creation of objects with rolling arrays.
